// Module names are of the form poly_<inkscape-path-id>().  As a result,
// you can associate a polygon in this OpenSCAD program with the corresponding
// SVG element in the Inkscape document by looking for the XML element with
// the attribute id="inkscape-path-id".

// fudge value is used to ensure that subtracted solids are a tad taller
// in the z dimension than the polygon being subtracted from.  This helps
// keep the resulting .stl file manifold.
fudge = 0.1;

module poly_path65(h)
{
  scale([25.4/90, -25.4/90, 1]) union()
  {
    difference()
    {
       linear_extrude(height=h)
         polygon([[-17.973864,-40.361323],[-13.815280,-40.046834],[-10.133010,-39.103365],[-6.927055,-37.530917],[-4.197413,-35.329489],[-2.017364,-32.573896],[-0.460186,-29.338936],[0.474120,-25.624609],[0.785556,-21.430914],[0.474120,-17.247904],[-0.460186,-13.541207],[-2.017364,-10.310821],[-4.197413,-7.556748],[-6.927055,-5.355327],[-10.133010,-3.782884],[-13.815280,-2.839418],[-17.973864,-2.524929],[-22.123289,-2.839418],[-25.802505,-3.782884],[-29.011514,-5.355327],[-31.750315,-7.556748],[-33.930364,-10.310821],[-35.487542,-13.541207],[-36.421848,-17.247904],[-36.733284,-21.430914],[-36.421848,-25.624609],[-35.487542,-29.338936],[-33.930364,-32.573896],[-31.750315,-35.329489],[-29.011514,-37.530917],[-25.802505,-39.103365],[-22.123289,-40.046834],[-17.973864,-40.361323]]);
       translate([0, 0, -fudge])
         linear_extrude(height=h+2*fudge)
           polygon([[-17.973864,-33.546380],[-20.002779,-33.347915],[-21.790483,-32.752521],[-23.336976,-31.760198],[-24.642258,-30.370945],[-25.678849,-28.621411],[-26.419272,-26.548227],[-26.863526,-24.151395],[-27.011610,-21.430914],[-26.863526,-18.721118],[-26.419272,-16.331919],[-25.678849,-14.263315],[-24.642258,-12.515307],[-23.336976,-11.126055],[-21.790483,-10.133731],[-20.002779,-9.538337],[-17.973864,-9.339873],[-15.934269,-9.538337],[-14.138934,-10.133731],[-12.587859,-11.126055],[-11.281045,-12.515307],[-10.244454,-14.263315],[-9.504031,-16.331919],[-9.059778,-18.721118],[-8.911693,-21.430914],[-9.059778,-24.151395],[-9.504031,-26.548227],[-10.244454,-28.621411],[-11.281045,-30.370945],[-12.587859,-31.760198],[-14.138934,-32.752521],[-15.934269,-33.347915],[-17.973864,-33.546380]]);
    }
  }
}

module loveheart
poly_path65(2);
poly_path69(2);
poly_path219(2);
poly_path74(2);
poly_path76(2);
poly_path52(2);
poly_path80(2);
poly_path72(2);
poly_path78(2);
poly_path63(2);
poly_path57(2);
poly_path67(2);
}

for(k=[0:36:144])
    translate([0,k,0])
    loveheart();
